mapper.update: update t_user_grant set token=#{token}, imgurl=#{imgurl}, nickname=#{nickname}, updtime=#{updtime} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
update t_user set imgurl=#{imgurl}, username=#{username}, updtime=#{updtime} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, username, email, account, password ,type, imgurl,enable ,ctime, updtime) values (#{id},#{username},#{email},#{account},#{password},#{type},#{imgurl},#{enable},#{ctime},#{updtime})
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_user where t_user.account=#{account}
